about__description:
During my undergraduate studies, I received honors such as the National Scholarship, University Special Scholarship, Outstanding Student of the University, University Model Student, and Outstanding Student Cadre, etc.

Major Courses: Data Structures, Computer Organization and Architecture, Computer Networks, Operating Systems, Database, Python, etc.

qualification7__title: Graduation Project: Parking Space Recognition System Based on xxx
qualification8__title: QQ Chatbot Based on Nonebot2 and go-cqhttp
qualification8__subtitle: Utilized go-cqhttp interface and Nonebot2 framework to implement various automation features, including kicking, muting, and sending messages. Designed intelligent reply functionality based on certain rules for messages from other QQ users. Successfully deployed Nonebot2 plugins such as 'expression pack creation' and 'wordle game' to provide entertainment features. Independently developed a poker game plugin, integrating poker games into QQ groups, allowing group members to play poker games within the QQ group. Implemented natural language conversation functionality with users through integration with OpenAI's GPT-3 (Note: GPT-3.5 was not yet released at that time).
qualification9__title: Educational System Assistant Based on WeChat Official Account
qualification9__subtitle: The project aims to provide convenient services for students, including library seat reservation, grade inquiry, and classroom availability check functions. By binding the WeChat official account with students' educational system accounts, users can complete operations related to the educational system through simple message interactions on WeChat. The project is deployed on Tencent Cloud's OpenCloudOS cloud server, using nginx as the web server. It utilizes the Python requests library to simulate browser operations on the educational system and immediately returns the results to users through the WeChat official account.
